channel.title: What rages you mitb?
channel.description:
I am banned from 4chan, so I have come to ask..
What rages you mitb? What grinds your gears?
For me, Women, women really grind my gears, and niggers too!

item.title: What rages you mitb?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Ownz_U Java Ownz U
item.description:
@Java_Ownz_U wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

I rage over the fact that I have a vacation, while I could be doing some school work so I’d be finished with school earlier. I mean: 2 weeks christmas vacation, then I had 1 week normal lessons. And now already 2 weeks free, followed by three school weeks and another week vacation. So out of the past/coming 9 weeks, I have 5 weeks vacation. I mean, what the fuck?

Get a life and you’d be more happy on vacation.

Read full topic

Tico135:

item.title: What rages you mitb?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:136, topic:255974”][quote author=Niall link=topic=338172.msg2645053#msg2645053 date=1233168168]
it TAKES FOREVER to find a single game(usually the more players there are in the playlist, the longer it is to find a game…) and when you do find a game, most of the time the other players are retards.
[/quote]
I though that was just my connection, I normally just invite some random friends that are know are not retards and play. Did you go upstairs at level <13?[/quote]

I usually only go upstairs when someone else opens it, else if you open it and no one notices it, then well, good game. The random box room should be defend-able with 4 people, you just need 1 guy with a good gun to guard the entrance to the bigger room.

EDIT:

Fat Cookies:

I though that was just my connection

I did too, but I don’t see why it’s my connection when it’s only nazi-zombies that loads slowly, I find regular games fine, as well as the regular co-op campaign games fine.

Read full topic

item.title: What rages you mitb?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

The nazi zombie mode on COD5: WAW. It was so hyped up that many(including me) bought COD5 knowing that it’s basically a reskinned COD4 with nazi zombies. However, on the PS3 version, it TAKES FOREVER to find a single game(usually the more players there are in the playlist, the longer it is to find a game…) and when you do find a game, most of the time the other players are retards. Me and someone I met lasted to round 13 only using standard guns(no ray gun/flamethrower) because we both knew what we were doing. Shortly after in another game, I died since I was left in the big room alone, and the other 3 players couldn’t defend the random box room for shit, despite one of them having a ray gun, and another having a MG42.

Read full topic
